title: Diana's passive needs to be looked at!
body: I have been playing Diana since she has been released and I noticed something. Her Passive does not show a notification on the tool bar or on the champion how many times she has auto attacked for her to deal more damage. For example, Vayne's W silver bolts mark the enemies and shows the rings under the champion, letting Vayne know how many times she needs to auto attack to complete the damage. As for Diana, I know it shows when the next auto attack will deal more damage, but that also needs to have a timer. A timer shown on the toolbar. A notification.

replies.body: I do agree that she needs a timer at least for the tool bar. But for now, I don't know if you noticed, but her sickle glows when her next strike is going to proc her passive.
Yeah I am completely aware of when her sickle glows but it needs to have a timer. Or a countdown til when Diana players need to auto attack before the passive goes away.
{{champion:57}}  has a buff counter. No reason {{champion:131}}  cant have something similar.

Noc has a timer on the passive itself and always has 
TF has a counter for his E 
Diana's weird for not
she needs one like master yi has. a simple grayed out icon of her passive with the number of auto's, switching to the colored icon when she performs 2 AA's.
YES!! Exactly! She NEEDS it! I completely agree!
And when it becomes colored it should have a timer of how long it lasts before wearing off!
Diana glows when she has two auto attacks stacked before she releases the third empowered one. A visible counter would be convenient though. :p

While I feel you on the need for a timer, that isn't the thing i think needs fixed about her passive. I think they need to remove the 20% AS and give her some more base AS. The way it is current gimps her AS scaling and makes Nashors a worse purchase than it should be.
Could you elaborate on this statement, specifically with some sort of mathematical reasoning? I'm actually curious why you think the 20% attack speed on her passive is essentially inhibiting her.

The reason this is punishing is while yes it does give you some more attack speed at level 1
Having higher base attack speed would be better.. why? Well because all the attack speed you buy is based on your base attack speed

Examples of how it works
**A**
200% bonus attack speed 0.5 base attack speed
3*0.5=1.5 attack speed

**B**
100% bonus attack speed with 0.75 base attack speed
2*0.75=1.5 attack speed

So in the first case **A **you have 200% bonus attack speed and yet you only get as much as case **B **which only has 100% bonus attack speed this is because **base attack speed** matters a lot

If anything they'll do something like that whenever they give her a gameplay update/rework. It'd be nice but not something that needs to be done.

I just bought Diana, she is so fun to play, and it was the very first thing I noticed! Riot has been talking about creating clarity in the game and I feel this would greatly help Diana players. I know that there is a crescent under her that grows as you reach your third auto-attack but it's pretty hard to see, I feel that should be more pronounced. The most important thing is that a time indicator notification should be created that shows how much time is left before the passive wears off if you don't auto attack in time.
